qas.question: In what month and year did Bell telephone across the country?
What company office did Bell make the original cross country phone call from?
What city did Bell make the first cross country call from?
What city did Bell make the first cross country call to?
Who was on the other end of the first cross country phone call?

context: In <a0_0>January 1915<a0_0/>, Bell made the first ceremonial transcontinental telephone call. Calling from the <a1_0>AT&T<a1_0/> head office at 15 Dey Street in <a2_0>New York<a2_0/> City, Bell was heard by <a4_0>Thomas Watson<a4_0/> at 333 Grant Avenue in <a3_0>San Francisco<a3_0/>.
